X3d

The 3d graphics were developed using x3d.

X3dom

To enable the display of the x3d x3dom is used to render the 3d model without the need of installing software in your browser. X3dom requires that javascript be enabled and also that your browser supports WebGl (see the next section for browsers). X3dom is still in development, if you encounter any problems refresh the webpage in your browser and that normally fixes the problem. We will update Moon Apps4u to use newer versions of x3dom when they are released.

Browsers supporting x3dom Firefox, Safari on Mac, IOS, Firefox mobile for Android.

Check to see if your browser supports x3d

WebGL

The project is based on WebGL

browsers supporting Web GL

Find a WebGL enabled browser

You can check to see if your browser supports WebGL. If you see a spinning cube then you do.
